* Recode new SAT math section to old SAT math section

RECODE new_sat (200=200)
(210=200)
(220=210)
(230=220)
(240=220)
(250=230)
(260=240)
(270=240)
(280=250)
(290=260)
(300=260)
(310=270)
(320=280)
(330=280)
(340=290)
(350=300)
(360=310)
(370=330)
(380=340)
(390=350)
(400=360)
(410=370)
(420=380)
(430=390)
(440=400)
(450=410)
(460=420)
(470=430)
(480=440)
(490=450)
(500=460)
(510=470)
(520=490)
(530=500)
(540=510)
(550=520)
(560=530)
(570=550)
(580=560)
(590=570)
(600=580)
(610=590)
(620=600)
(630=610)
(640=620)
(650=630)
(660=640)
(670=650)
(680=650)
(690=660)
(700=670)
(710=680)
(720=690)
(730=700)
(740=710)
(750=720)
(760=740)
(770=750)
(780=760)
(790=780)
(800=800) INTO old_sat.



* Usage example:

INPUT PROGRAM.
LOOP id=1 to 10.
END CASE.
END LOOP.
END FILE.
END INPUT PROGRAM.
EXECUTE.

COMPUTE new_sat=TRUNC(RV.UNIFORM(200,800),10).
EXECUTE.

RECODE new_sat (200=200)
(210=200)
(220=210)
(230=220)
(240=220)
(250=230)
(260=240)
(270=240)
(280=250)
(290=260)
(300=260)
(310=270)
(320=280)
(330=280)
(340=290)
(350=300)
(360=310)
(370=330)
(380=340)
(390=350)
(400=360)
(410=370)
(420=380)
(430=390)
(440=400)
(450=410)
(460=420)
(470=430)
(480=440)
(490=450)
(500=460)
(510=470)
(520=490)
(530=500)
(540=510)
(550=520)
(560=530)
(570=550)
(580=560)
(590=570)
(600=580)
(610=590)
(620=600)
(630=610)
(640=620)
(650=630)
(660=640)
(670=650)
(680=650)
(690=660)
(700=670)
(710=680)
(720=690)
(730=700)
(740=710)
(750=720)
(760=740)
(770=750)
(780=760)
(790=780)
(800=800) INTO old_sat.
EXECUTE.
